item.title: Proving Grounds - Snookums
item.description: CTF Walkthrough - Intermediate linux box found in TJNull OSCP like boxes list. Lets give it a try. Enumeration └─$ nmap -sV -sC -v 192.168.119.58 | tee nmap PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 21/tcp open ftp vsftpd 3.0.2 | ftp-anon: Anonymous FTP login allowed (FTP code 230) |_Can't get directory listing: TIMEOUT | ftp-syst:...

item.title: Proving Grounds - Pelican
